title: Rolf Harris in Tasmania
creator_credit: Tasmanian State Film Unit and Don Anderson
brief_description: International TV artist, musician and comedian Rolf Harris visits the major tourist attractions of Tasmania. The film highlights national parks, islands, buildings, cities and towns, as well as industrial undertakings such as mining, paper mills, forestry and hydro-electric works. The leisurely pace of life and the recreational facilities of Tasmania are emphasised through the eyes of this famous Australian.
